text: Hagi Babiloni vahe'mo'za Ra Anumzamofo mono nompi vu'za, bronsireti'ma tro'ma hu'naza fumaza zafaramina runafe'nafu hu'za e'neri'za, Ra Anumzamofo mono nompima bronsireti'ma tro'ma hu'naza zuompama tima afintageno'ma nemanea zuompane, agia'a raminena ru tamana tamanu hute'za ana maka bronsiramina eri'za Babiloni vu'naze.
